thread.title: Watch Will Ferrell & Amy Poehler Start an Illegal Casino in ‘The House’
thread.title_full: Watch Will Ferrell & Amy Poehler Start an Illegal Casino in ‘The House’

author: Alec Banks
title: Watch Will Ferrell & Amy Poehler Start an Illegal Casino in ‘The House’

organizations.name: watch will ferrell & amy poehler start

text:
Combining two Saturday Night Live heavyweights who have gone onto successful movie careers, The House imagines a scenario where Will Ferrell and Amy Poehler learn that they don’t have enough money to send their daughter to the college of her dreams.
Racked by guilt and indecision, the duo decides it’s in their best interest to open an illegal casino in their home. But rather than merely featuring a few card games, it evolves into a full on operation – complete with wild pool parties, boxing matches and all the rest of the debauchery associated with Sin City.
The House premieres June 2, 2017.
For more movie news, read up on the rumor that Mel Gibson may assume the director’s chair for Suicide Squad 2 .
